resources.string: Stay informed with notifications as your turn approaches. Receive instant updates on your queue status, allowing you to plan your time effectively and minimize wait times.
WaitSmart is your, Queue Management Solution. Join virtual queues, get real-time updates, and optimize your wait times. Welcome to the future of waiting.
Simply scan a QR code to instantly receive your queue number. Say goodbye to long lines and waiting. Get started with WaitSmart for seamless queue management.
To get a number in Queue :

Queueing Instructions:


1. Get your queue number by scanning a QR Code or typing the Serial Number.

2. Feel the buzz! Your phone will vibrate when you're 5 numbers away from being served.

3. Don't worry about missing your turn! If you fail to show up when called, we'll automatically requeue you. You'll be placed at the end of the queue to ensure fairness.

4. Automatic queueing will be only triggered once. After that, simply rescan or retype the Serial Number to join again.

Queueing Instructions:

1. Get your queue number by scanning a QR Code or typing the Serial Number.
2. Feel the buzz! Your phone will vibrate when you're 5 numbers away from being served.
3. Don't worry about missing your turn! If you fail to show up when called, we'll automatically requeue you. You'll be placed at the end of the queue to ensure fairness.
4. Automatic queueing will be only triggered once. After that, simply rescan or retype the Serial Number to join again.
Thank you for joining the queue with WaitSmart! Your number has been assigned. Please wait for your turn. We appreciate your patience!"
